snippet: A security firm identified Iranian hackers as the source of coordinated attacks against more than 50 targets in 16 countries, many of them corporate and government entities.
abstract: Security firm Cylance releases report that identifies Iranian hackers as source of coordinated attacks against more than 50 targets in 16 countries, many of them corporate and government entities.
lead_paragraph: A security firm identified Iranian hackers as the source of coordinated attacks against more than 50 targets in 16 countries, many of them corporate and government entities.

headline.main: Report Says Cyberattacks Originated Inside Iran
headline.print_headline: Report Says Cyberattacks Originated Inside Iran
